system.test: Two -30 Forbidden Lore (Heresy) or -30 Linguistics (Low Gothic)
system.requirements: Character must know a word of power spend extensive time learning the rituals surrounding each word of power, which must be entirely memorised as to write them down robs them of potency. If Character has Trade (Linguist) or Trade (Remembrancer), Ritual Tests are +0 rather than -30. They will then recite the entire curse from memory before speaking the Word of Power.
system.effect: Target suffers effects of whichever Word of Power was spoken: Bane: when target takes damage, roll 1d10, on a 1 attack has Crippling(X), where X is their Corruption Bonus, stacks with existing Crippling Qualities.. Banish: Target gains Warp Instability Trait, or its tests become -20 if they already had it. Benumb (Slaanesh): Target halves Agility and Perception Characteristics, rounding up. Bewilder: target suffers -20 to any test involving Awareness, Charm, Command, Commerce, Deceive, Intimidate, Logic, or Scrutiny. Bind: If target is Psyker, their Psy Rating is reduced by their WP Bonus (minimum 1). Blaze(Tzeentch): when target takes damage, roll 1d10, on a 1 the attack has the Flame Quality, if it already had it, test to avoid is -30. Bleed(Khorne): when target takes damage, roll 1d10, on a 1 they suffer Blood Loss. Blight(Nurgle):When target takes damage, roll 1d10, on a 1 attack has Toxic(X), where X is their Corruption Bonus, stacks with existing Toxic Qualities.
system.failure: Character and those involved in the curse suffer its effects for WP bonus weeks, +1 per DoF. Cannot perform curse again until Infamy has Increased
